channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Göteborg)

item.title: 2020-09-17 19:00 Bitcoin After-Work - Göteborg Bitcoin Tech Meetup
item.description: Welcome to join us at Brewer's Beer Bar to enjoy some Bitcoin Based discussions, some beers and pizza, and just hanging out in general. No agenda, but any techie or philosophical discussions touching bitcoin are encouraged, and also brainstorming and ideas about future meetups...

item.title: 2020-11-01 09:00 foss-north 2020 Community Day - foss-gbg
item.description: The foss-north 2020 take II Community Day - free of charge. Please visit http://foss-north.se/2020/communityday.html for details. The foss-north 2020 take II Conference runs November 2-3, follow...

item.title: 2020-09-09 17:00 Test clinic - Passion for Testing - Gothenburg
item.description: It feels safe enough now to arrange a test clinic, but of course we take it for granted that no one shows up who feels sick in any way. I have booked a larger restaurant this time to increase our ability to keep our distance. So to the topic. A test clinic is...
